ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] EQ Weddings held in public
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I was wondering what ... I don t have a problem with weddings, but I agree that they should be held in out-of-the-way zones, or in another channel. If I
ygData.messageBody:
--- sastvis <sastvis@...> wrote:
I was wondering what
> you all think of
> weddings in EQ and was i justified in shouting train
> and telling them
> that they should hold their wedding in private if
> they don't want to
> hear all the shouts and ooc's of a zone.
>
> Piezie V'rix
> 47th Necromancer
> Fennin Ro
>
>

I don't have a problem with weddings, but I agree that
they should be held in out-of-the-way zones, or in
another channel. If I was in that zone, I wouldn't
want to watch the wedding spam in /ooc, and I don't
want to turn that channel off in case something
pertaining to the game is being said.

I attended a wedding at the top of the SS tower once.
It was very nice, pretty area with all the dragons
around, and we weren't bothering anyone. ;)

=====
~~~~~~~~~

And on the eighth day God said, "O.K. Murphy. You take over."
